pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, February 20, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Halifax, Nova Scotia

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the community gathering in support of the Barho family.

Grand Parade Square, City Hall
1814 Argyle Street
